price: Foi-lhe dito: "Agora?! E, com efeito, desobedeceste antes, e foste dos corruptores!"
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: āl'āna waqad ʿaṣayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidīna
